name: The Goblin (SeizeUp Studios)
description:
This game is the strategy game  based on tower defence concept, in this game you have install the weapon to keep your village safe from The Goblin attack, this game allow you to upgrade your weapon to make more impact to the goblin, as well as you can sell any weapon that you have then install it into the different place, can wait to see you can try our game !!!

Controller

[W][A][S][D] / [cursor at the every edge of screen] for  side to side movement

[Mouse Scrolling] to view closer

[Left click] to select Weapon
